Name: Dead Quest
About the game: Dead Quest is a top down shooter survival game, with RPG elements. You are on a mission to find hidden keys and map pieces scattered throughout various levels and areas. Each piece brings you closer to the next, and every key unlocks more of your base. Leading to the end game.
